section.title: Ticket::DynamicTicketTemplate
section.para: Group: OTRSDynamicTicketTemplates, Subgroup: Core
Allows the use of Dynamic Ticket Templates in Ticket creation screens.

section.title: Ticket::DynamicTicketTemplate::CustomerGroup
section.para: Group: OTRSDynamicTicketTemplates, Subgroup: Core
Allows to assign Dynamic Ticket Templates to Customer Groups.

section.title: Ticket::DynamicTicketTemplate::CustomerGroup::Notify
section.para: Group: OTRSDynamicTicketTemplates, Subgroup: Core
Notifies Agents when a Customer creates a Ticket but doesn't have a Dynamic Ticket Template assigned.
Note... The notification subject and text can be changed under "Admin" -> "Agent Notifications" -> "Agent::MissingCustomerGroupDTTAssignment".

chapter.title: Technical Implementation Details
chapter.para: This module uses customized versions of the frontend perl modules AgentTicketActionCommon, AgentTicketEmail, AgentTicketPhone, AgentTicketPhoneCommon and CustomerTicketMessage, this files are located in Custom/Kernel/Modules and are prepared to support ITSM modules and OTRSTicketWorkflow or OTRSTicketWorkflow modules if detected trough particular "Sysconfig" settings.
There are two Output Filters that modifies the Agent and Customer screens to provide the required enhancements on the fly (without the need of modify the .dtl files).
